text:
Kristina Kucherenko (born February 18, 1998 in Moscow) is a Russian actress. She has acted in many Russian films and television shows as well as on stage.
Kucherenko studied ballet at the Frunze Choreographic School. She also graduated from the Gerasimov Institute of Cinematography. Her first role was in 2007 in an episode of the series "След" [Trace]. Additional roles include Catherine the Great as a child in the television series "детстве" [The Great] (2015), Aliya in "Крымский мост. Сделано с любовью!" [The Crimean Bridge. Made with Love!] (2018), and Margarita in the 2020 movie "На острие" [On the Edge].
